page.title: 11FRADDAM'S WINNING HORSE
page.content: Mr.Anthony Pascoe of Fraddam Farm won the shire horse championship at the {Royal Cornwall Show}in June 1985 with his two year old horse Fraddam Duchess. Mr.Pascoe was made an offer for the horse only a few weeks before the championship but turned it down. A Canadion who bought Fraddam Actress,Fraddam Duchess's sister,plans to return to Cornwall to buy more horses. Mr.Pascoe was presented with the {Pollard Trophy}at the Royal Cornwall Show for the second time in three years. Fraddam Duchess won a prize last year at the Peterborough Show and won at Helston in 1984.Mr.Pascoe has sold two horses to the U.S.A. and two to Canada.
